name: Ralph
text:
Ralph
Ralph was a boy from Twin Peaks, Washington.
While driving past the Double R Diner with Carrie and Russ, Ralph took out a handgun from a box that Carrie had unwittingly stashed in back and fired out of the car, through the window of the Double R Diner. They stopped their car in the road, causing a traffic jam, and Carrie screamed at Russ for not telling her about the gun. When Deputy Briggs arrived to assess the situation, Ralph stared at him silently.
